alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 8:53PM EDT until June 14 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 853 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Cairo to 9 miles north of Havana to near Quincy to near Greensboro to 10 miles north of Blountstown, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Midway, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Chattahoochee, Greensboro, Gretna, Alma, Lake Bradford, Cody, Florence, South City, Quincy Airport and Bloxham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.
